headlines.description: John Egan grabbed an 80th-minute equaliser as Sheffield United earned a 1-1 draw at Burnley in the Premier League on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Egan blast earns Blades a point at Burnley

events.name: West Ham United at Newcastle United

headlines.description: Newcastle United twice came back from a goal down as they grabbed a 2-2 Premier League draw with West Ham United on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Newcastle bounce back to draw with West Ham

headlines.description: Liverpool's first game back at Anfield was a quiet affair as they saw off the challenge of Aston Villa 2-0.
headlines.shortLinkText: Quiet return to Anfield as Liverpool win 2-0

headlines.description: Che Adams's first-half goal gave Southampton a surprise 1-0 win over Manchester City at St. Mary's stadium on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Southampton hold on for win over Man City
